title: No AD runes on Marksmen? Your advice please.
body:
How Much do i really need AD marks for adc?

I have always resented them being part of my setup, they seem so underwhelming.

I have a setup i mainly use with 9 AD marks, 3 AS quints, 9 Armor seals and 4 AS glyphs and 5 MR glyphs. What i would like to do is run 9 AS marks and 3 LifeSteal Quints instead, keeping the seals and glyphs the same. I feel this would be better for laning because you would have the sustain, but how much harder will it be to last hit? Is it worth buying a long sword earl for extra AD after your original dorans start?

any advice is appreciated. Thanks guys.

replies.body:
I agree with what people have said. I main ADC and it really depends on what your after (as RainbowWindslash has pointed out).

It also really depends on what champion you are playing and then what playstyle.

For example if your playing Cait, I would take AD Marks, get that farm and harass in early. You don't generally need armor pen early as the armor that players have is quite low.

Makes last hitting easier, more c/s = earlier BFS = more brutality

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/71681532/200514951?tab=overview

IMO attack speed is icing on the cake for Caitlyn, it's good to have more AS but shouldn't be your core build as Caitlyn since it's not the cake itself. 

For Vayne and Twitch it's a bit different, you will definitely need some attack speed.

Only take armor pen if you are 100% sure you will win the lane. Most of the time something will go wrong, e.g. your mid has TPG

Attack speed isn't as good because you aren't non stop auto attacking in the lane phase, you are last hitting and harassing occasionally. You will trade better with attack speed marks, but last hitting will be harder, and since lane phase is like 85% last hitting, I would say AD marks are the way to go.

Also, most ADC's abilities scale with AD.

Yeah fair enough point to make about the not non stop attacking in lane phase, but i do find that Autoing creeps is smoother and issuing an attack command is executed smoother with more atk speed, and your AD natually scales with levels anyway and i figure, if i can last hit ok with level 1 atk (of around 65 without AD reds), why can't i last hit ok or better with level 3 atk of about 71-73?.

Most adc's abilities scale with AD, so i would like to be able to itemize AD where you get the biggest bonuses, rather than having less AS through runes and having to include it in the item build. I hate itemizing AS especially on jinx and tristana...

Thanks to everyone for their input !

I run Armor Pen runes instead of flat AD. I just find the Armor Pen to be worth more.

That moment when you run FULL pen on Riven.

"Wtf is wrong with your dmg?"

Runes are all preference any way
-Easier early game last hitting etc choose flat AD
-Better scaling into late game choose Armor Pen
-More/earlier sustain take Life Steal
-Want to get more attacks in take AS
Really none of these are bad options it just depends on your champ/playstyle
